segments.text: I decided to give it a go !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good for you . What items did you bid on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A DENY shirt and one of Serena Williams ' used tennis rackets !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your idol ! Wow ! You're even better at finding stuff than me !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yep . I placed a bid for the shirt . The minimum was ten so I bet fifty !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's not how this game works .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , there was a sign that said “ Buy now for seventy . ”
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many bids had been placed before you ?
segments.speaker: S2
